document.full_text: - substantially higher humidity, lighter winds, and the possibility of drenching thunderstorms had firefighters battling the huge pk complex brush fire in north texas more optimistic on saturday than they have been in days, officials said.
document.title: weather may help fight against massive texas wildfires
lines_and_colors: - substantially higher humidity, lighter winds, and the possibility of drenching thunderstorms had firefighters battling the huge pk complex brush fire in north texas more optimistic on saturday than they have been in days, officials said.
